testcase.name: Test the index action returns the correct model
Test the create action returns the correct model
Test the save action correctly persists an instance

error.message: Cannot redirect for object [null - null] it is not a domain or has no identifier. Use an explicit redirect instead

Use an explicit redirect instead at com.hrms.EmpController.tt__save_closure9_closure14(EmpController.groovy:43) at com.hrms.EmpController.$tt__save(EmpController.groovy:40) at com.hrms.EmpControllerSpec.Test the save action correctly persists an instance(EmpControllerSpec.groovy:54)

testcase.name: Test that the show action returns the correct model
Test that the edit action returns the correct model

error.message: Cannot get property 'id' on null object

testcase.error: java.lang.NullPointerException: Cannot get property 'id' on null object at com.hrms.EmpControllerSpec.Test the update action performs an update on a valid domain instance(EmpControllerSpec.groovy:122)

testcase.name: Test that the delete action deletes an instance if it exists
testcase.failure:
junit.framework.AssertionFailedError: Condition not satisfied:
Emp.count() == 1 | | 0 false
at com.hrms.EmpControllerSpec.Test that the delete action deletes an instance if it exists(EmpControllerSpec.groovy:142)
